    • Method Detail

      • getSubscription

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSubscription(java.lang.String email)
                                          throws QueryException
        A sample URL to call this service is http://servername/ipm-ws/data-subscription/getSubscription?email=PittEmail
        Parameters:
        email - The subscriber's Pitt's email.
        Returns:
        The list of values as specified by the query parameters in a JSON string with an HTML response code of 200. If an error occurs a 400 or 500 HTML response code will be returned along with a description of the error.
        Throws:
        QueryException

      • getAllDiseases

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllDiseases()
                                         throws QueryException
        A sample URL to call this service is http://servername/ipm-ws/data-subscription/getAllDiseases
        Returns:
        A list of all the diseases in json with an HTML response code of 200. If an error occurs a 400 or 500 HTML response code will be returned along with a description of the error.
        Throws:
        QueryException

        Returns:
        A list of all the data types. The response is returned as json with an HTML response code of 200.
        Throws:
        QueryException
